name: DEVICE_TYPE_INFO
description: This table contains basic information on device types. Each device type (FDV) record can be a group of devices or even as granular as a specific model, depending on how your organization has set up the system.

columns.name: DEVICE_TYPE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the device type record.

columns.name: DEVICE_TYPE_ID_DEVICE_TYPE_NAME
columns.description: The name of this Device Type.

columns.name: DEVICE_TYPE_NAME
columns.description: The name of this Device Type.
